name: The Death Mask
description:
The Death Mask is a mobile mystery game where you collect information by changing your identity in a masquerade. Sometimes an arrogant noble, sometimes a sneaky servant, the player will untangle a mystery of political intrigue and murder.

In this game, you are the Captain of the Guard tasked by Queen Aveline to retrieve an important artifact that was stolen before the Masquerade began. However, as the night falls, things take a turn for the worse and you must find out what really is happening.

Developed as a MFA Thesis project at USC. Originally developed for mobile and available on the Google Play Store.
